title: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working. For example, the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
OB: When launching the Help view on 20020326, Win2K, the tab key does not do anything.
EB: When launching the Help view on 20020326, Win2K, the tab key should navigate through the interactive elements.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view on Win2K, version 20020326.
2. Attempt to navigate using the tab key in the Help view.
